name: Kitsune Battlemage
description:
Support us by Wishlisting


Kitsune Battlemage is an intense elemental magic combat game where you're not limited to any specific school or style of magic. Choose your abilities and wage battle using powerful combinations of elemental spells!


Choose abilities from any of the elements and switch things up to engage in tactical spellcasting battles.


Battlemages enter the training grounds via portals that connect worlds. Train your skills against others in elemental combat!


Master the elements: Fire, Frost, and Earth. Choose your abilities to match your playstyle, fit your team, and battle your opponents!

KEY FEATURES:
  • Online 3v3 arena combat
  • Choose any combination of Fire, Earth, and Ice magic with 8 abilities per element
  • Offline solo wave mode
  • Health, mana, and stamina resources that can be attacked via different skills
  • Primary attacks have stacking buffs and debuffs
